title: Mafia King's Angel Abducted
description: I am the most ruthless, yet compassionate Mafia King in the world. My name strikes fear in most men. No one will go against me. They wouldn’t dare.When the love of my life is abducted, all of my morals are put to the test. I will do everything in my power to find her and bring her back home before it’s too late. No one touches what’s mine. While attempting to find her, we uncover that a faction has been working in my territory abducting women and children. Every fiber of my possessive and protective being reaches levels not even I knew I could reach. I will not rest until all that is left of their world is the embers of what they once held dear. The only question is in my mission to save my girl, will I survive the war?
author: Anneke Boshoff
